TopicTitle: Any fixes for these three bugged engines from Novapunch?

Articles.Content:
I already posted in the Novapunch thread, but as I understand it, the OP of that thread didn't make one of the engines. So, I'm wondering if anybody is able to fix them or if theres a fix available.

(also, how do I make the imgur album show in the post?)

[http://imgur.com/gallery/efvMq](http://imgur.com/gallery/efvMq)

Edit: Actually, I just realized that two of the problem engines (not sure about one of them) were made by the OP of that thread, so, this thread may be a bit too preemptive.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T19:16:30Z" title="03/31/2015 07:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by smjjames**

> 
> (also, how do I make the imgur album show in the post?)

With the [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/%5B/noparse%5D)

[/noparse]
You might start with [this section of Beale's tutorial](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/3242-Part-Modding-Tutorial-4-5-Unity-Import-Export-To-Game) on modeling engines for KSP.

> 
> With the [noparse][imgUR][/noparse] tag, like this: [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/efvMq](http://imgur.com/a/efvMq)[/noparse]

Oh, thanks.

> You might start with [this section of Beale's tutorial](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/3242-Part-Modding-Tutorial-4-5-Unity-Import-Export-To-Game) on modeling engines for KSP.

Nah, even if I knew a little bit about how to do modeling engines, it's Tiberions stuff anyway and I don't really want to mess with it. He's already put it on the list of things to fix anyway.
